attributes.additional_details:
Introduce legislation to ban slow moving  construction site vehicles  (  earth moving and digging  and dump trucks etc)    as well as agricultural  vehicles with trailers,   from travelling on public roads during  the hours of darkness.

Frequently such vehicles   have defective  lights,   or lights  obscured by mud  and soil.   They can be all but invisible,   and such vehicles have caused too many fatalities on our roads.
